item.title: What Are Two Key Differences Between BigQuery and Redshift?
item.description: Big Data. We often hear about this word but we arenâ€™t quite sure how to define it. Literature says that having more than 1 TB of data can be considered as Big Data. After getting a mild idea of the concept, our next question would be: How can we manage such a large amount of data to find useful insights out of it? Well, one approach that can answer this lies in data warehousing.
